methods.name: SetSensorName
methods.description: Set Sensor Name Request.  Note that the Sensor Name is part of the BLE advertisement.

methods.name: SetSensorLocation
methods.description: User configurable string that is unused by sensor.

methods.name: SetBLEAdvertisingInterval
methods.description: Set BLE Adversiting Interval in milliseconds.

methods.name: SetBLEAdvertisingDuration
methods.description: Set BLE Adversiting Duration in milliseconds.

methods.name: SetSettingsLock
methods.description: Lock out future changes to device settings.  Reserved for future use.

methods.name: SetBatterySenseInterval
methods.description: Set Battery Sense interval in seconds.  0 = disabled.

methods.name: SetTemperatureSenseInterval
methods.description: Set Temperature Sense interval in seconds.    0 = disabled.

methods.name: SetTemperatureAggregationValue
methods.description: Set Temperature Aggregation value (number of samples).

methods.name: SetDigitalOutput1
methods.description: Set Digital Output Value in millivolts

methods.name: SetDigitalOutput2
methods.description: Set Digital Output Value in millivolts

params.name: digitalInput1
params.description:
0 = Switch to Ground
1 = Switch to Battery

params.name: digitalInput2
params.description:
0 = Switch to Ground
1 = Switch to Battery

methods.name: SetUseCodedPhy
methods.description: When 1 the coded phy is used as the secondary phy to send connectable but nonscannable extended advertisements.

methods.name: SetNetworkId
methods.description: Used to group sensors. For example: Say you have 4 sensors in the warehouse and 2 in the office and you just want look at the sensors in the office you would filter on that ID

methods.name: SetConfigVersion
methods.description: The version can be used to help synchronize changes made by a phone application and a gateway.  This value is unused by the sensor.

methods.name: SetHardwareVersion
methods.description: Only the minor version can be set.

methods.name: SetLedTest
methods.description: This is for hardware testing only

params.name: ledTestActive
params.description: On off time of each LED
